title: 新人不懂飛.....
author: fertilizerlok
txt_content:
怎樣才可以飛起啊?
有時飛有時飛不起= =

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
创造模式双击空格
cjbmod用f键飞

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 双击空格键，前提你在creative或装了mod

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 创造模式下连按两下空格就行了

replies.author: hhyx
replies.txt_content:
Creative mode 双击空格
Mycraft V
CJB mods -_- 没用过
Single Player Commands /fly，fly
Zombe mods 自己设定
